TelemetryIngest._comment: Enable specific connectors by name (Simulator/RabbitMq/Kafka). Empty or omitted means all registered connectors run.
TelemetryIngest._commentBatchSize: Number of telemetry messages per batch sent to router and sinks.
TelemetryIngest._commentChannelCapacity: Bounded channel capacity. Lower values apply backpressure sooner; higher values buffer more.

EventSinks._comment: Enabled event sinks (Logging/ParquetStorage). Empty or omitted means all registered sinks run.

Kafka._comment: Kafka connector settings (only used when Kafka is enabled).

Simulator._comment: Simulator connector settings (no env var fallback; set explicitly as needed).
Simulator._commentBuildingName: Must match the Simulator seed building name for Point Snapshot lookup.
Simulator._commentSpaceId: Must match the Simulator seed area name for Point Snapshot lookup.
Simulator._commentPointsPerDevice: Points per device (min 1). Point IDs are p1..pN.
